title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement nicolas.casajus@gmail.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.0, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/0/ code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https:// www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Nicolas Casajus. Author, maintainer. Kevin Cazelles. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Casajus N, Cazelles K (2024). omdbr: Retrieve Movies Metadata OMDb Database. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/inSileco/omdbr.
code: @Manual{,   title = {omdbr: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database},   author = {Nicolas Casajus and Kevin Cazelles},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://github.com/inSileco/omdbr}, }

what: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database
title: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database
text: package omdbr R client OMDb API. User can retrieve information movies (title, actors, year, genres, etc.) download cover (available) using YTS API.

title: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database
text: package uses OMDb API requires API Key. can freely obtain . ’ll use package omdbr first time, ’ll guided store personal API key.

title: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database
text: install omdbr package, run following command: load package:

title: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database
text: Objective: Getting information cover Darjeeling Limited movie directed Wes Anderson. STEP 1: Find IMDb identifier movie package omdbr uses IMDb ID retrieves information cover movie. function find_imdb_id() tries find ID. 💡 argument year can used reduce results. 💡 can also find ID searching movie title IMDb website extract URL. URL Darjeeling Limited : https://imdb.com/title/tt0838221. STEP 2: Get movie information retrieve information movie use function get_details(): 💡 Results stored data/tt0838221.yml (path can changed using argument path). want get access data can use function read_details(): STEP 3: Get movie cover Now, can try download movie cover function get_cover():  💡 Results stored follow:
code: x <- find_imdb_id("The Darjeeling Limited") ## ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ## ℹ Searching 'The Darjeeling Limited' in movies title... ## ✔ 2 matches found! ##   Returning the 2 best matches ## ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── str(x) ## 'data.frame':    2 obs. of  3 variables: ##  $ title : chr  "The Darjeeling Limited" "The Darjeeling Limited (2007)" ##  $ year  : chr  "2007" "2007" ##  $ imdbid: chr  "tt0838221" "tt24819872" ##                           title year     imdbid ## 1        The Darjeeling Limited 2007  tt0838221 ## 2 The Darjeeling Limited (2007) 2007 tt24819872 x <- get_details(imdb_id = "tt0838221") ## ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── ##  ## - imdbid: tt0838221 ##   type: movie ##   title: The Darjeeling Limited ##   year: 2007.0 ##   runtime: 91.0 ##   director: Wes Anderson ##   writer: ##     - Wes Anderson ##     - Roman Coppola ##     - Jason Schwartzman ##   actors: ##     - Owen Wilson ##     - Adrien Brody ##     - Jason Schwartzman ##   genre: ##     - Adventure ##     - Comedy ##     - Drama ##   plot: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train ##     in an attempt to bond with each other. ##   language: ##     - English ##     - Hindi ##     - German ##     - Punjabi ##     - Tibetan ##     - French ##   country: ##     - United States ##     - India ##   imdbrating: 7.2 ##   slug: the-darjeeling-limited-2007 ##  ## ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── class(x) ## [1] "data.frame" ##      imdbid  type                  title year runtime     director ## 1 tt0838221 movie The Darjeeling Limited 2007      91 Wes Anderson ##                                           writer ## 1 Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman ##                                         actors                    genre ## 1 Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman Adventure, Comedy, Drama ##                                                                                                                      plot ## 1 A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other. ##                                           language              country ## 1 English, Hindi, German, Punjabi, Tibetan, French United States, India ##   imdbrating                        slug ## 1        7.2 the-darjeeling-limited-2007 x <- read_details(imdb_id = "tt0838221") ##      imdbid  type                  title year runtime     director ## 1 tt0838221 movie The Darjeeling Limited 2007      91 Wes Anderson ## 2 tt0838221 movie The Darjeeling Limited 2007      91 Wes Anderson ##                                           writer ## 1 Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman ## 2 Wes Anderson, Roman Coppola, Jason Schwartzman ##                                                      actors ## 1 Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman, Amara Karan ## 2              Owen Wilson, Adrien Brody, Jason Schwartzman ##                      genre ## 1 Adventure, Comedy, Drama ## 2 Adventure, Comedy, Drama ##                                                                                                                      plot ## 1 A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other. ## 2 A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other. ##                                           language              country ## 1 English, Hindi, German, Punjabi, Tibetan, French                  USA ## 2 English, Hindi, German, Punjabi, Tibetan, French United States, India ##   imdbrating                        slug ## 1        7.2 the-darjeeling-limited-2007 ## 2        7.2 the-darjeeling-limited-2007 get_cover(imdb_id = "tt0838221") ## ✔ Cover found for 'tt0838221' ! . ├── covers │   └──tt0838221.jpg └── data     └──tt0838221.yml  2 directories, 2 files

title: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database
text: Please note omdbr project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

what: Count Movies by Field (by Actor, by Genre, by Year, etc.) — count_movies
title: Count Movies by Field (by Actor, by Genre, by Year, etc.) — count_movies
text: function counts movies category: genre, year, actors, director, writer, language country.

title: Count Movies by Field (by Actor, by Genre, by Year, etc.) — count_movies
Count Movies by Field (by Actor, by Genre, by Year, etc.) — count_movies
text: count_by field count movies . path folder containing YAML files (root project).

title: Count Movies by Field (by Actor, by Genre, by Year, etc.) — count_movies
text: 2-columns data frame.

title: Count Movies by Field (by Actor, by Genre, by Year, etc.) — count_movies

what: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
title: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
text: function tries retrieve IMDb identifier movie based title using OMDb API http://www.omdbapi.com/. User can also specify release year movie. See details informations.

title: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
code: find_imdb_id(search, year = NULL, n_max = 10, sleep = 0.1, verbose = TRUE)

title: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
text: search movie title search . year (optional) release year movie. n_max Number matches returned (default 10). sleep Time interval two API requests. verbose boolean. TRUE, prints informations.

title: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
text: data frame : title: movie title year: year release imdbid: IMDb ID movie

title: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
text: better results, write complete movie title exact spelling. Results sorted similarity search terms. find movie looking , can visit IMDb website (https://www.imdb.com) get ID movie URL. always form: tt9999999 (numbers specific movie; prefix 'tt' constant). instance, URL: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5699154/, IMDb ID 'tt5699154'. non-English movies, English name might different original title. example, English title french movie "Le Sens de la fête" (2017) "C'est la vie!" (IMDb ID = tt5699154). movies currently implemented.

title: Retrieve the IMDb Identifier of a Movie — find_imdb_id
code: if (FALSE) { find_imdb_id(search = "solo a star wars story")  find_imdb_id("Star Wars", year = 2018, n_max = 20) }

what: Retrieve Cover/Poster of a Movie — get_cover
title: Retrieve Cover/Poster of a Movie — get_cover
text: function retrieves movie cover using YTS API https://yts.mx/api. API key required movies listed IMDb/OMDb databases available YTS https://yts.mx.

title: Retrieve Cover/Poster of a Movie — get_cover
Retrieve Cover/Poster of a Movie — get_cover
text: imdb_id IMDb ID movie. path folder save cover.

title: Retrieve Cover/Poster of a Movie — get_cover

what: Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
title: Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
text: function retrieves movie metadata (title, actors, year, genres, etc.) using OMDb API http://www.omdbapi.com/. Results exported YAML file returned data frame. See details informations.

title: Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
text: imdb_id IMDb ID movie. path folder store results. print boolean. TRUE (default), movie informations printed.

title: Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
text: data frame : imdbid: IMDb ID movie type: category (e.g. movie) title: movie title year: year release runtime: movie runtime (minutes) director: vector directors writer: vector writers actors: vector main actors genre: vector genres plot: short plot movie language: vector spoken languages country: vector countries imdbrating: IMDb rating (date request) slug: unique identifier (titre + year)

title: Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
text: (free) API key required use OMDb API. can register http://www.omdbapi.com/. using package first time, asked setting API key (just follow instructions). request performed using IMDb identifier movie. find ID can use function find_imdb_id(). retrieve IMDb ID, visit IMDb website (https://www.imdb.com) get ID movie URL. always form: tt9999999 (numbers specific movie; prefix 'tt' constant). instance, URL: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt5699154/, IMDb ID 'tt5699154'. non-English movies, English name might different original title. instance, English title french movie "Le Sens de la fête" (2017) "C'est la vie!" (IMDb ID = tt5699154). movies currently implemented.

title: Retrieve Metadata of a Movie — get_details
code: if (FALSE) { x <- get_details("tt0120863", path = ".", print = TRUE) }

what: omdbr: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database — omdbr-package
title: omdbr: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database — omdbr-package
text: package retrieves movies metadata (title, actors, year, genres, etc.) using OMDb API http://www.omdbapi.com/ (API key required). Cover can also downloaded YTS API https://yts.mx/api (API key required).

title: omdbr: Retrieve Movies Metadata from OMDb Database — omdbr-package
text: Maintainer: Nicolas Casajus nicolas.casajus@gmail.com Authors: Kevin Cazelles kevin.cazelles@gmail.com

title: Read Metadata of Movie(s) — read_details
text: function reads YAML files movie(s) metadata stored function get_details()

title: Read Metadata of Movie(s) — read_details
text: path folder containing YAML files (root project). imdb_id (optional) IMDb ID(s) movie(s). print boolean. TRUE (default), movie informations printed (one single IMDb ID required).

title: Read Metadata of Movie(s) — read_details
text: data frame : imdbid: IMDb ID movie type: category (e.g. movie) title: movie title year: year release runtime: movie runtime (minutes) director: vector directors writer: vector writers actors: vector main actors genre: vector genres plot: short plot movie language: vector spoken languages country: vector countries imdbrating: IMDb rating (date request) slug: unique identifier (titre + year)

title: Read Metadata of Movie(s) — read_details
code: if (FALSE) { x <- read_details() x <- read_details(imdb_id = "tt2278388", print = TRUE) x <- read_details(imdb_id = c("tt2278388", "tt0362270")) }

title: Search for Movies — search_movies
text: function searches movies details stored. User can search title, year, etc.

title: Search for Movies — search_movies
code: search_movies(   title,   year,   genre,   director,   writer,   actors,   country,   language,   path = "." )

title: Search for Movies — search_movies
text: title Terms search title field. year Year(s) search year field. genre Terms search genres field. director Name(s) search director field. writer Name(s) search writer field. actors Name(s) search actors field. country Country names search country field. language Language name(s) search language field. path folder containing YAML files (root project).

title: Search for Movies — search_movies
text: data frame.
